snippet: An inquiry into whether teachers in the Long Island district improperly coached elementary students now includes an accusation that administrators changed a Regents exam grade.
abstract: Investigation into whether teachers in Glen Cove, LI, school district improperly coached students on standardized tests has expanded to include an allegation that administrators changed a Regents exam grade for at least one high school student; no charges or disciplinary actions have initiated.
lead_paragraph: An inquiry into whether teachers in the Long Island district improperly coached elementary students now includes an accusation that administrators changed a Regents exam grade.

headline.seo: New Glen Cove Allegation on Handling of State Test
headline.main: Long Island Inquiry Includes Claim of Altered High School Exam Score
headline.print_headline: L.I. Inquiry Now Includes Claim That Regents Exam Score Was Altered
